LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodgePart.label: Hunter's lodge
LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodgePart.description: A small outpost, used by friendly factions as a hunting base.
LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodgePart.descriptionDialogue: There's usually a large herd of {0} coming through around this time of year
LanguageData.MFI_HuntersLodgePart.arrivedLetter: 您的商队已经抵达猎人小屋。这里似乎没有人，但他们显然在等着你们，并把这里布置得很好客。
